name: v1_animals
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool animals_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Detailed and interesting facts for thousands of animal species. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/animals.
API description: Queries the API Ninjas Animals API endpoint to return up to 10 results matching the input animal name.

name.description: The common name of the animal to search. This parameter supports partial matches (e.g., "fox" will match "gray fox" and "red fox").
